org.phantomapi.game

Interface Game

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameObjectContainer, PlayerContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhantomGame

    public interface Game
extends PlayerContainer, GameObjectContainer
    Represents a game instance
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameController getController()
      Get the game controller.
      GamePlugin getPlugin()
      Get the parent controller object or plugin
      GameProfile getProfile()
      Get the game profile for defining basic things
      GameState getState()
      Get the game state.
      GameStatus getStatus()
      Get the game status
      boolean joinGame(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Join the player into the game
      void quitGame(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Quit the player from the game

      Start the game up after it's been initialized

      Stop the game

      • Methods inherited from interface org.phantomapi.game.PlayerContainer

        contains, getPlayers

      • Methods inherited from interface org.phantomapi.game.GameObjectContainer

        contains, getGameObjects

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        void startGame(String... lauchParameters)
        Start the game up after it's been initialized
        Parameters:
        lauchParameters - the start parameters can be used for multi game environments or startup options. These are not needed for every type of game, no need to use them

      • stopGame

        void stopGame(String... endParameters)
        Stop the game
        Parameters:
        endParameters - these are used for passing data to the game when stopped, once again, not always needed, but they are there if needed

      • getPlugin

        GamePlugin getPlugin()
        Get the parent controller object or plugin
        Returns:
        the game plugin

      • getController

        GameController getController()
        Get the game controller. Used for handling the game and processing things that happen along with the event bus
        Returns:
        the game controller

      • getState

        GameState getState()
        Get the game state. Used for holding objects, data and status information. Also for configurations and settings
        Returns:
        the game state

      • getStatus

        GameStatus getStatus()
        Get the game status
        Returns:
        the status of this game instance

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(GameStatus status)
        Set the game status. Used for informing other handlers that the game has either started or has ended for async startups
        Parameters:
        status - the game instance status

      • getProfile

        GameProfile getProfile()
        Get the game profile for defining basic things
        Returns:
        the game profile

      • joinGame

        boolean joinGame(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Join the player into the game
        Parameters:
        p - the player

      • quitGame

        void quitGame(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Quit the player from the game
        Parameters:
        p - the player
